post_message: Missouri was one of the first states in the nation to reject President Obama’s fundamentally flawed health care law. For the past five years, I’ve heard from countless Missouri workers, seniors, and families who are facing higher costs and fewer choices due to the president’s health care take-over. As we mark the 5th anniversary of #ObamaCare becoming law today, I’m still fighting to repeal this flawed law and replace it with common-sense health care solutions.
